channel.title: Good server to go on (req plz)
channel.description: ok so me and my brothers computers have the same router which means same ip... so i was wandering if anybody knew a good mopar server that works on macs is fun and can allow what it thinks to be double log in... well plz reply

item.title: Good server to go on (req plz)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You cannot request anything here. I suggest you use a WinterLove base server to learn the basics and then work up to a more advance server like Hyperion, RS377, SHARD, or other scratches. Almost all servers use some form SYI blocking method, but you could just use some thing simpler then most like an Array List to handle the connections.

Read full topic
item.source: Good server to go on (req plz)
